thought.text: Let me try to work around this by directly testing the separable module. Since the issue is specifically with the separable.py module, I can try to import it directly:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmpbx0kuhou/astropy && python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); from astropy.modeling.separable import separability_matrix; print('separability_matrix imported successfully')"
